00029 #ifndef SC_FIFO_H
00030 #define SC_FIFO_H
00031 
00032 
00033 #include "sysc/communication/sc_communication_ids.h"
00034 #include "sysc/communication/sc_prim_channel.h"
00035 #include "sysc/communication/sc_fifo_ifs.h"
00036 #include "sysc/kernel/sc_event.h"

00038 #include "sysc/tracing/sc_trace.h"

00041 namespace sc_core {

00043 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00044 //  CLASS : sc_fifo<T>
00045 //
00046 //  The sc_fifo<T> primitive channel class.
00047 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00048 
00049 template <class T>
00050 class sc_fifo
00051 : public sc_fifo_in_if<T>,
00052   public sc_fifo_out_if<T>,
00053   public sc_prim_channel
00054 {
00055 public:
00056 
00057     // constructors
00058 
00059     explicit sc_fifo( int size_ = 16 )
00060       : sc_prim_channel( sc_gen_unique_name( "fifo" ) ),
00061         m_data_read_event( sc_event::kernel_event, "read_event" ),
00062         m_data_written_event( sc_event::kernel_event, "write_event" )
00063       { init( size_ ); }
00064 
00065     explicit sc_fifo( const char* name_, int size_ = 16 )
00066       : sc_prim_channel( name_ ),
00067         m_data_read_event( sc_event::kernel_event, "read_event" ),
00068         m_data_written_event( sc_event::kernel_event, "write_event" )
00069       { init( size_ ); }
00070 
00071 
00072     // destructor
00073 
00074     virtual ~sc_fifo()
00075         { delete [] m_buf; }
00076 
00077 
00078     // interface methods
00079 
00080     virtual void register_port( sc_port_base&, const char* );
00081 
00082 
00083     // blocking read
00084     virtual void read( T& );
00085     virtual T read();
00086 
00087     // non-blocking read
00088     virtual bool nb_read( T& );
00089 
00090 
00091     // get the number of available samples
00092 
00093     virtual int num_available() const
00094         { return ( m_num_readable - m_num_read ); }
00095 
00096 
00097     // get the data written event
00098 
00099     virtual const sc_event& data_written_event() const
00100         { return m_data_written_event; }
00101 
00102 
00103     // blocking write
00104     virtual void write( const T& );
00105 
00106     // non-blocking write
00107     virtual bool nb_write( const T& );
00108 
00109 
00110     // get the number of free spaces
00111 
00112     virtual int num_free() const
00113         { return ( m_size - m_num_readable - m_num_written ); }
00114 
00115 
00116     // get the data read event
00117 
00118     virtual const sc_event& data_read_event() const
00119         { return m_data_read_event; }
00120 
00121 
00122     // other methods
00123 
00124     operator T ()
00125         { return read(); }
00126 
00127 
00128     sc_fifo<T>& operator = ( const T& a )
00129         { write( a ); return *this; }
00130 
00131 
00132     void trace( sc_trace_file* tf ) const;
00133 
00134 
00135     virtual void print( ::std::ostream& = ::std::cout ) const;
00136     virtual void dump( ::std::ostream& = ::std::cout ) const;
00137 
00138     virtual const char* kind() const
00139         { return "sc_fifo"; }
00140 
00141 protected:
00142 
00143     virtual void update();
00144 
00145     // support methods
00146 
00147     void init( int );
00148 
00149     void buf_init( int );
00150     bool buf_write( const T& );
00151     bool buf_read( T& );
00152 
00153 protected:
00154 
00155     int m_size;                 // size of the buffer
00156     T*  m_buf;                  // the buffer
00157     int m_free;                 // number of free spaces
00158     int m_ri;                   // index of next read
00159     int m_wi;                   // index of next write
00160 
00161     sc_port_base* m_reader;     // used for static design rule checking
00162     sc_port_base* m_writer;     // used for static design rule checking
00163 
00164     int m_num_readable;         // #samples readable
00165     int m_num_read;             // #samples read during this delta cycle
00166     int m_num_written;          // #samples written during this delta cycle
00167 
00168     sc_event m_data_read_event;
00169     sc_event m_data_written_event;
00170 
00171 private:
00172 
00173     // disabled
00174     sc_fifo( const sc_fifo<T>& );
00175     sc_fifo& operator = ( const sc_fifo<T>& );
00176 };
00177

00179 // IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII
00180 
00181 template <class T>
00182 inline
00183 void
00184 sc_fifo<T>::register_port( sc_port_base& port_,
00185                             const char* if_typename_ )
00186 {
00187     std::string nm( if_typename_ );
00188     if( nm == typeid( sc_fifo_in_if<T> ).name() ||
00189         nm == typeid( sc_fifo_blocking_in_if<T> ).name() 
00190     ) {
00191         // only one reader can be connected
00192         if( m_reader != 0 ) {
00193             SC_REPORT_ERROR( SC_ID_MORE_THAN_ONE_FIFO_READER_, 0 );
00194             // may continue, if suppressed
00195         }
00196         m_reader = &port_;
00197     } else if( nm == typeid( sc_fifo_out_if<T> ).name() ||
00198                nm == typeid( sc_fifo_blocking_out_if<T> ).name()
00199     ) {
00200         // only one writer can be connected
00201         if( m_writer != 0 ) {
00202             SC_REPORT_ERROR( SC_ID_MORE_THAN_ONE_FIFO_WRITER_, 0 );
00203             // may continue, if suppressed
00204         }
00205         m_writer = &port_;
00206     }
00207     else
00208     {
00209         SC_REPORT_ERROR( SC_ID_BIND_IF_TO_PORT_,
00210                          "sc_fifo<T> port not recognized" );
00211         // may continue, if suppressed
00212     }
00213 }
00214 
00215 
00216 // blocking read
00217 
00218 template <class T>
00219 inline
00220 void
00221 sc_fifo<T>::read( T& val_ )
00222 {
00223     while( num_available() == 0 ) {
00224         sc_core::wait( m_data_written_event );
00225     }
00226     bool read_success = sc_fifo<T>::nb_read(val_);
00227     sc_assert( read_success );
00228 }
00229 
00230 template <class T>
00231 inline
00232 T
00233 sc_fifo<T>::read()
00234 {
00235     T tmp;
00236     read( tmp );
00237     return tmp;
00238 }
00239 
00240 // non-blocking read
00241 
00242 template <class T>
00243 inline
00244 bool
00245 sc_fifo<T>::nb_read( T& val_ )
00246 {
00247     if( num_available() == 0 ) {
00248         return false;
00249     }
00250     bool read_success = buf_read( val_ );
00251     if( SC_LIKELY_(read_success) ) {
00252         m_num_read ++;
00253         request_update();
00254     }
00255     return read_success;
00256 }
00257 
00258 
00259 // blocking write
00260 
00261 template <class T>
00262 inline
00263 void
00264 sc_fifo<T>::write( const T& val_ )
00265 {
00266     while( num_free() == 0 ) {
00267         sc_core::wait( m_data_read_event );
00268     }
00269     bool write_success = sc_fifo<T>::nb_write(val_);
00270     sc_assert( write_success );
00271 }
00272 
00273 // non-blocking write
00274 
00275 template <class T>
00276 inline
00277 bool
00278 sc_fifo<T>::nb_write( const T& val_ )
00279 {
00280     if( num_free() == 0 ) {
00281         return false;
00282     }
00283     bool write_success = buf_write( val_ );
00284     if( SC_LIKELY_(write_success) ) {
00285         m_num_written ++;
00286         request_update();
00287     }
00288     return write_success;
00289 }
00290 
00291 
00292 template <class T>
00293 inline
00294 void
00295 sc_fifo<T>::trace( sc_trace_file* tf ) const
00296 {
00297     (void) tf; /* ignore potentially unused parameter */
00298 #if defined(DEBUG_SYSTEMC)
00299     char buf[32];
00300     std::string nm = name();
00301     for( int i = 0; i < m_size; ++ i ) {
00302         std::sprintf( buf, "_%d", i );
00303         sc_trace( tf, m_buf[i], nm + buf );
00304     }
00305 #endif
00306 }
00307 
00308 
00309 template <class T>
00310 inline
00311 void
00312 sc_fifo<T>::print( ::std::ostream& os ) const
00313 {
00314     if( m_free != m_size ) {
00315         int i = m_ri;
00316         do {
00317             os << m_buf[i] << ::std::endl;
00318             i = ( i + 1 ) % m_size;
00319         } while( i != m_wi );
00320     }
00321 }
00322 
00323 template <class T>
00324 inline
00325 void
00326 sc_fifo<T>::dump( ::std::ostream& os ) const
00327 {
00328     os << "name = " << name() << ::std::endl;
00329     if( m_free != m_size ) {
00330         int i = m_ri;
00331         int j = 0;
00332         do {
00333             os << "value[" << i << "] = " << m_buf[i] << ::std::endl;
00334             i = ( i + 1 ) % m_size;
00335             j ++;
00336         } while( i != m_wi );
00337     }
00338 }
00339 
00340 
00341 template <class T>
00342 inline
00343 void
00344 sc_fifo<T>::update()
00345 {
00346     if( m_num_read > 0 ) {
00347         m_data_read_event.notify(SC_ZERO_TIME);
00348     }
00349 
00350     if( m_num_written > 0 ) {
00351         m_data_written_event.notify(SC_ZERO_TIME);
00352     }
00353 
00354     m_num_readable = m_size - m_free;
00355     m_num_read = 0;
00356     m_num_written = 0;
00357 }
00358 
00359 
00360 // support methods
00361 
00362 template <class T>
00363 inline
00364 void
00365 sc_fifo<T>::init( int size_ )
00366 {
00367     buf_init( size_ );
00368 
00369     m_reader = 0;
00370     m_writer = 0;
00371 
00372     m_num_readable = 0;
00373     m_num_read = 0;
00374     m_num_written = 0;
00375 }
00376 
00377 
00378 template <class T>
00379 inline
00380 void
00381 sc_fifo<T>::buf_init( int size_ )
00382 {
00383     if( size_ <= 0 ) {
00384         SC_REPORT_ERROR( SC_ID_INVALID_FIFO_SIZE_, 0 );
00385         return;
00386     }
00387     m_size = size_;
00388     m_buf = new T[m_size];
00389     m_free = m_size;
00390     m_ri = 0;
00391     m_wi = 0;
00392 }
00393 
00394 template <class T>
00395 inline
00396 bool
00397 sc_fifo<T>::buf_write( const T& val_ )
00398 {
00399     if( m_free == 0 ) {
00400         return false;
00401     }
00402     m_buf[m_wi] = val_;
00403     m_wi = ( m_wi + 1 ) % m_size;
00404     m_free --;
00405     return true;
00406 }
00407 
00408 template <class T>
00409 inline
00410 bool
00411 sc_fifo<T>::buf_read( T& val_ )
00412 {
00413     if( m_free == m_size ) {
00414         return false;
00415     }
00416     val_ = m_buf[m_ri];
00417     m_buf[m_ri] = T(); // clear entry for boost::shared_ptr, et al.
00418     m_ri = ( m_ri + 1 ) % m_size;
00419     m_free ++;
00420     return true;
00421 }
00422

00424 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00425 
00426 template <class T>
00427 inline
00428 ::std::ostream&
00429 operator << ( ::std::ostream& os, const sc_fifo<T>& a )
00430 {
00431     a.print( os );
00432     return os;
00433 }
